dsDescriptionValue.value: In tandem with the rapid globalization of science, spatial scientometrics has become an important research sub-field in scientometric studies. Recently, numerous spatial scientometric contributions have focused on the examination of cities’ scientific output by using various scientometric indicators. This dataset contains data on cities' publication output in terms of the number of journal articles indexed by the Scopus database in the period from 1986 to 2015.

keywordValue.value: publication output, journal articles, spatial scientometrics

grantNumberAgency.value: János Bolyai Research Scholarship of the Hungarian Academy of Sciences
